      • readCoursesID

        public static java.util.Vector<java.lang.Integer> readCoursesID(java.lang.String studentID)
        Get all course identifiers where a selected student is registered.
        Parameters:
        studentID: - User name of the selected student
        Returns:
        List of course. A null course is returned if selected student does not have registered courses.
